content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "budget"
(
    budget_id     TEXT
            primary key,
    category      TEXT,
    spent         REAL,
    remaining     REAL,
    amount        INTEGER,
    event_status  TEXT,
    link_to_event TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "expense"
(
    expense_id          TEXT
            primary key,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_date        TEXT,
    cost                REAL,
    approved            TEXT,
    link_to_member      TEXT,
    link_to_budget      TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_budget) references budget(budget_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE event
(
    event_id   TEXT
        constraint event_pk
            primary key,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date TEXT,
    type       TEXT,
    notes      TEXT,
    location   TEXT,
    status     TEXT
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/student_club.sqlite" "SELECT e.expense_description, e.cost, ev.event_name FROM expense e JOIN budget b ON e.link_to_budget = b.budget_id JOIN event ev ON b.link_to_event = ev.event_id WHERE ev.event_name = 'September Speaker' AND e.expense_description = 'Posters';"
